website_summaries.verdict: A sophisticated lamp that will go well in any modern room.
pros: Stands out for its beautiful wood finish with frosted-glass dome shade

customer_reviews.title: ... to be much nicer than I anticipated - it's nice and heavy
customer_reviews.text: This turned out to be much nicer than I anticipated - it's nice and heavy, sturdy, and attractive. If you've ever put together a lamp, then assembly is simple, but there are no clear instructions. I agree with other reviewers that the packing foam is horrible: you get little bits of broken foam clinging to everything - it's a real mess.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lackore

customer_reviews.title: The floor lamp version Adeso 4052 is poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I am revising and resubmitting my review in an attempt to review the Adeso 4052 floor lamp I bought with the Adeso 4050 table lamps. Whereas the 4050 is beautiful and apparently well-made, the 4052 floor lamp is a piece of junk. For whatever reason the Amazon system will not allow me to review the 4052 individually but lumps it in with reviews on the 4050, possibly to skew the negative comments on the more expensive 4052. The lamp arrived with both switches broken and the gooseneck rusted. What I received was obviously someone else’s return because the interior packaging was broken into pieces.
customer_reviews.author: NoID99

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed, frustrating experience. Had to return lamp.
customer_reviews.text: We had to return this lamp due to poor construction. Because the internal wiring was too long (over 1"), it was impossible to connect the lamp pieces together. We assumed the pricier cost would equate to higher quality, but we were so wrong. Very disappointed with this lamp company Adesso--they need to improve quality control standards. (And don't blame 'Made in China'--we went to Home Depot, bought a near identical lamp for $40, also Made in China, and are happy with it.)
customer_reviews.author: Furminator

customer_reviews.title: poor fit poor assembly
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice lamp when assembled. However assembly was horrible. The post from the base to mount the light assembly would not attach. I had to disassemble the light fixture unscrew the threaded tube that joins the light to the base unscrew the tube to make it stick out longer from the light fixture then reassemble the light and attach it to the support. Very poor as provided. Unless you are comfortable disassembling and reassembling the lamp don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: RichH

customer_reviews.title: Ugh.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my bedroom. Opened it up (packaging exploded in a glorious mess of little styrofoam balls) As I was pulling the cord through the base to get the top to connect, I noticed the screws had crushed the sides of the lightbulb holders down instead of holding them securely together. Thankfully, I could glue and straighten it out, but for $60 I shouldn't need to get my tool box out and change out things to make it work. I couldn't send it back because the packing was all over my floor. I wanted matching lamps on either side of my bed. Seriously rethinking buying another one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp
customer_reviews.text: The base is nice and heavy so this is really not easy to topple over. We have 2 high energy cats, one of which broke our previous lamp that was replaced by this, and it hasn't budged from it's spot even with all their shenanigans ! It matches our ceiling fan perfectly, too, so this was a great buy ! It's easy to assemble and set up. You can choose between using 1 or both bulbs when in use. I find that 1 bulb provides plenty of light for reading. Great lamp !
customer_reviews.author: Karen Hyde

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Lots of light. Side light works great. Low setting on main lamp flickers.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lamp. It is sturdy and doesn't lean. It is attractive and puts out a lot of light. I'm using LED bulbs. Since we're working from home a lot more, I'm even ordering another one for a different room. However, on the dimmer light setting, it flickers like a bad fluorescent bulb. I'm using it in an office setting, so I don't want mood lighting there. if you really care about that, check out the other reviews to see if others are experiencing the same.
customer_reviews.author: Eider

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, well made lamp
customer_reviews.text: Just received the lamp. Packed extremely well and very easy to put together. I think it looks beautiful on the night stand in the guest room. It is sturdy and pull chains are easy to reach. I like the brightness with both bulbs on but have the option to use just one light. I plan on getting the matching floor lamp down the line. FYI - Amazon has the best price and I looked at many places before ordering. Also, received a day after ordering.
customer_reviews.author: We share her Amazon

customer_reviews.title: A lamp I would recommend to my Mother
customer_reviews.text: We needed a new lamp for the den. My wife shopped the local stores but couldn't find anything she liked. I said I would look and see what AMAZON had. I say this lamp thought it would be perfect and ordered it. When it arrived, we assembled it and fell in love with it. I had no trouble putting it together. The size fit right in and we preferred the two chain switches to the three way bulb it replaced. It a beautiful lamp and we expect many years service from it.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred H.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a bad design. I am a handy person and assembled ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a bad design. I am a handy person and assembled many furniture and floor lamp. This is the worst one. No place to put the extra long wire above the switch. I pushed really hard to try to feed it in, until the wire was broken. Return it.
customer_reviews.author: Yan W.

customer_reviews.title: Beauty and not cheap looking.  Very mice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice heavy glass domes , these are beautiful and bright. We have white led bulbs in them can only turn on one bulb because of brightness. We turn the lamps so the bulbs are in back so they don’t distract us while watching tv. These light our living room completely. Nice Nickle candlestick base and neck. You won’t be disappointed with these. Not a cheap looking lamp very very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Lovely lamp. Looks much more expensive than what it is. The others who have received broken/missing parts are unfortunate, because it is actually a high quality lamp. Be aware that once an item is shipped out, its handling is no longer controlled by the seller. I expected to be one of those unlucky ones, but I was pleasantly surprised. Matches the furniture nicely and looks great in my bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Liza Cas

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product with unfit packaging for return
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these items as our lamps were broken during the Napa earthquake in August 2014. One of the lamps was just fine but this one was defective. The wiring inside the lamp was clamped too tightly inside one of the pole segments and could not be threaded through the lamp segmegments properly so assembly could not be completed. Unfortunately the product was removed from the packaging for assembly before the defect was discovered the packaging was a type that could not be used for repacking the lamp for return/refund. I
customer_reviews.author: Kyle  O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: Great looking lamp
customer_reviews.text: I've had this lamp for 2 years now. It sits on the end table next to where I sit on the couch so it's used every day. I have 2 different wattage bulbs in it so I can have it dim or bright. I love it!!!! Very classy looking. My first one came with the shade broken, but Amazon had the replacement on the way before I even sent the 1st one back. If I needed another one I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon S.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, well made
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very heavy based. Perfect height for night stands. Looks and feels more expensive than they are. Had an issue with the order and it was resolved very quickly. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dr wolf.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful lamp, I bought two for my desk and ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp, I bought two for my desk and love the look. Assembling it was not too bothersome (although, don't you wish everything was shipped to you assembled? hehe). I am using two LED bulbs, 2700 K (soft white) 450 lumens in each lamp. The only reason why I didn't give it 5 stars is - the glass domed shade is too heavy for the lamp and makes it a little wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Love these lamps!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these Adesso lamps we have purchased and we just love them!! They're beautiful and high quality and throw a lot of light. The pull chains make operating them very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Mike44NH

customer_reviews.title: Great Design, High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was exactly the perfect size and design For the room I was decorating. I bought one to see how it would work and when I received it, I was so thrilled, I bought another one. Works well on the nightstands that I have next to a large queen size bed.
customer_reviews.author: nyitaly

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous lamps! I bought a pair for our bedside tables and they're beautiful - very luxe, heavy, and look way more expensive than they were. I love the pull cords since I hate to stick my hands up there under the shade, half asleep - invariably, I touch the hot bulb, jump, and say a dirty word. My only complaint is that they're packed in that crumbly styrofoam - I'm still cleaning up all the little white bits. Otherwise, I'm very pleased with this purchase and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SusieQ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is just as it looks and is very easy to put together. It is solidly made and has simple, classic lines. We have it on a table in our foyer and it looks elegant. I'm very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: So well made
customer_reviews.text: So easy to assemble! Everything was there! This product was made in China. We've had bad experiences with other things we purchased from China, but this was a pleasant surprise. Sturdy, well built, solid. We are impressed. Highly recommended! We can all improve when we try harder.
customer_reviews.author: MRD

customer_reviews.title: Love the style and size of these lamps
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and size of these lamps, but because they were sitting on the end tables in our living room we found the glass shades were too transparent. The light coming through was very distracting and unpleasant...so I took a can of cream colored spray paint and coated the inside of the glass shades. Now, they are perfect, but I considered returning them until we came up with this solution to make the lampshades more opaque.
customer_reviews.author: jennym

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy, good-looking lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy, good-looking lamp, and exactly what I was looking for. I dropped it to four stars because after 2 years (and no moving it around or doing anything to it but dusting) it suddenly broke apart and spread tiny glass shards everywhere. I don't know if this was from a defect in the glass shade or an issue with this model. The glass cracked in a circle around the metal top that holds the shade, and then dropped and hit the light bulbs and shattered. Too bad! I really like this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant in buying this lamp, despite the good reviews, I was sure if it wasn’t just another cheap Chinese lamp. Upon unpacking, I realized it is a well designed, attractive lamp with a nice heavy base to stabilize it. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: builder

customer_reviews.title: I like the shade
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. I like the shade, but the post is cheaply made. The wood is not good quality and the light turns off on its own just when I am using it. I this it is shorting out because of poor connection. I will keep it since it is not convenient for me to return it. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Oistins

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Nice table or desk lamp. Bought these as end table lamps for bedside. Pull chains give you an option on luminence. Lamp has a stable base and nice glass shade. Good value for the money. Style is pretty universal so you can use it with most any room decor.
customer_reviews.author: P. Calderone

customer_reviews.title: Glass shade poorly made!
customer_reviews.text: Glass lamp shade broke first time could be made stronger. Had to send back first one. I like the lamp. But the glass shade worries me. If it breaks again its going in the dumpster!
customer_reviews.author: T. Shanahan

customer_reviews.title: This table lamp is really nice looking and with 2 cfl light bulbs in it ...
customer_reviews.text: This table lamp is really nice looking and with 2 cfl light bulbs in it puts out a lot of light!! I am using it as a desk lamp and it goes wonderful with the desk and the room that it's in. The only problem with the lamp was that when we put it together we noticed that it was crooked when we put the lamp shade on. But with a little push we were able to straighten it out so we didn't return it!! Other than that little glitch I would have given the lamp 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Emmy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish with good heavy base
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is perfect for a nightstand. It's the right height and the pull cords are easy to reach from the bed. It also has a good heavy base so it doesn't try to slide or tilt over.
customer_reviews.author: square.wave

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and functional!
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome lamp with two pull chain sockets for a very reasonable price. Nice and heavy base......get one before they go up in price!
customer_reviews.author: garo

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I changed my mind about this lamp but too late to cancel the order and I am very it was too late because I love it. The shade is a (don’t know how to describe it) kind of mottled pearl and it matches the shades on my ceiling fan. Another thing I like about this lamp is that it has 2 bulbs but they work independently hence the 2 strings. It is very very sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Rita G. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Attractively done!
customer_reviews.text: These are lovely (bought 2) on our end tables. The base is large, so no worries when pulling the chains to turn off/on...they shouldn’t turn over! The glass shade is attractive. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: SweetPea

customer_reviews.title: Really nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp! Large solid base, so it is not tipsy. Nice glass shade and two chains with two light bulbs, so you can turn on one or two.
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Love it.....but had to return 1
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the lamp. I purchased 2 lamps and was so excited when then arrived. As I took the first one out, I could tell I was going to like it. It was heavy, sturdy and just felt like I got my money's worth. Then I started opening the 2nd package and shattered glass was falling out of the box. I didn't even open it and will be returning. Otherwise, this would have received 5 stars. Home Depot has the lamp for the same cost. I'll be placing my order with them. Not risking it again.
customer_reviews.author: JADeCA

customer_reviews.title: these lamps are very nice quality, and have heavy frosted real-glass shades
customer_reviews.text: Although made in China, these lamps are very nice quality, and have heavy frosted real-glass shades. I tried 60 & 40 watt bulbs, but 25 watt works best and is perfect for a bedside reading lamp. 2 pull chains per lamp allows 2 brightness options. I recommend these lamps. They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu in TX

customer_reviews.title: This review is for the floor lamp. When I ...
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the floor lamp. When I tried to assemble the lamp I could not pull the excess cord through the lower lamp section. I applied lubricant and tried to gently work it loose but the cable snapped almost immediately. There are multiple other reviews stating the same issue, I believe the high reviews are for the table lamp so be aware if you're looking at the floor lamp.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Quality item, but
customer_reviews.text: Just noticed that the beam is not entirely straight. Not too out of alignment to merit a return though. Also, the metal and the wood, just get the job done. But the glass shade is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel

customer_reviews.title: Great look good value
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to find a lamp with two bulbs. This one is perfect, with modern look but classic in detail
customer_reviews.author: 2thdr

customer_reviews.title: The marble looking top cover does a great job to diffuse the lighting
customer_reviews.text: Looks very classy and elegant. Matches with my maple furniture quite well. The marble looking top cover does a great job to diffuse the lighting. It's also a bonus that there are two switches to support two bulbs so you can get the brightness you want.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this lamp! I purchased two of these lamps for our bedside tables in our bedroom. They are perfect! The quality is unmatchable! I've been to many different local retailers searching out just the right lamp and was unable to find it. This lamp fit the bill perfectly! I think it could be matched with almost any decor. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: good lamp - needs better packaging...
customer_reviews.text: overall its a solid, stable and good looking lamp. my issue is the base came dented, but I don;t want to deal with the hassle of sending it back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: The price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful looks like I paid more for them I just love it and easy to assemble 👍👍👍👍I think I will get another one
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful lamp. Easy to assemble and works perfectly. Exactly what I wanted. Many satisfied reviewers here praising the lamp for it's fine features so anything else I would say would just be redundant. I think anyone who gets this lamp will be very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: OhioClint

customer_reviews.title: Adesso Table Lamp Lights the way.
customer_reviews.text: The light was exactly as expected. Very high quality made. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Thom Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but ...
customer_reviews.text: These look good and we love the double chains. Assembly was a bit of a problem because one of ours came with a bent base, so when it was initially assembled it leaned. It took a little effort, but I was able to bend it back so that it stood straight.
customer_reviews.author: T. Artrip

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought two- looks great, seems well made, tons of styrofoam packing.
customer_reviews.author: TheHaddaway

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these and I am extremely happy with them. Its so nice to get the brightness you want. I love the pull chain for on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lamp. It's heavy duty and has two light bulbs in it. Was just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: A Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: So easy to turn on and off when you are going to sleep or waking up, no fumbling to find the knob or switch, just pull one of the chains. Looks pretty great too,
customer_reviews.author: Jayelh

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This lamp looks good and was easy to assemble. BUT, I hate it. It will not stand up straight. I have tried everything and it still leans. I would return it but I disposed of the packaging. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bedside lamps
customer_reviews.text: It was packaged very well. Not too difficult to put together. Look great. Only thing I wish is that they were just a little taller. Nice heavy base so lamp will not be accidently tipped over.
customer_reviews.author: E. J. Rediehs

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous lamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous lamp! It is very stylish, and with two bulbs you can have a little light or a lot of light in the room. We just love the pull chains. We use this lamp on the nightstand beside our bed. Just be careful not to knock it over, because the gorgeous glass globe breaks very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Lady

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was very easy to assemble and came with the right tools to put it together. It is a beautiful lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Halamicek

customer_reviews.title: Great Lamps and classy touch
customer_reviews.text: I bought one five years ago and then had a chance to use both end tables in a new setup and bought the same one five years later. They are very classy and go well with my decor.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and bright.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp! Using as a desk lamp, and one bulb turned on is bright enough.
customer_reviews.author: D. Boom

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous lamps!!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE!! These lamps are great! They are so beautiful and I love the two different bulbs and chains. So you can have a little or a lot of light.
customer_reviews.author: ringoe

customer_reviews.title: has a great office look
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my computer desk and provides light needed in my den
customer_reviews.author: BERNARDINE BATTLE

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the great quality. I had to put it together which ...
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by the great quality. I had to put it together which is also annoying since I have 5 thumbs on each hand, but once together, this is a very nice, pretty lamp with nice weight and solidity. I like it very much. I love that there are 2 chains - 1 per light and I can turn on one or both of the bulbs depending on how much light I want. I may get another one.
customer_reviews.author: MominSchool

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, attractive lamp
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, sturdy lamp. Put together very easily. Attractive. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk20

customer_reviews.title: Crooked and wobbly
customer_reviews.text: As with other reviewers, I found this lamp to be crooked and unstable. The stem assembles from several different pieces, and at several of the junctions the pieces did not screw together in a straight line. Plus the junction of the bottom stem piece to the base was wobbly. Once fully assembled the lamp clearly leaned to one side by 10 or 15 degrees, Taking it apart and reassembling it did not help. On the plus side, returning it to Amazon was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: California User

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice lamp . It is a perfect lamp for my kitchen table in the apartment. lamp for
customer_reviews.author: Dan D.

customer_reviews.title: Broken shade
customer_reviews.text: Waiting to see if the replacement arrives in one piece. The glass shade was broken in several places.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this lamp
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this lamp. Sturdy construction, super easy assembly, looks awesome! Plenty of light without being blinding, bulbs are not exposed by shade, shade is a heavy glass. I would highly recommend this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: dfin

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp fornightstand
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light for my nightstand. Looks great and is just the right height. Very classy looking lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Alex in Springfield

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & great price.
customer_reviews.text: It’s totally beautiful! Perfect size, brightness and weighted for use on living room end table.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Clark

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful on my table!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is very well made. Assembly was good. I had to change the order of assembly as you have to feed the cord thru the wooden post and out thru the base.. This made feeding the lamp cord to the base as lot easier. I am using 2 23 watt cfl's and the lamp looks extremely nice. It is alot heavier than I imagined and I am very happy with the purchase. Everything feels solid including the pull chains on the lamp sockets. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Charles E.

customer_reviews.title: It went together easily, in a matter of a few minutes
customer_reviews.text: This is a very bright lamp! It went together easily, in a matter of a few minutes. Feels nicely made. I would recommend it. (I'm also going to put lower wattage bulbs in it - it's bright!)
customer_reviews.author: Massachusetts Mom

customer_reviews.title: no fumbling for a switch!
customer_reviews.text: got two..switch on one did not work correctly..they sent a new lamp..a bit of a hassel, but the company made it pretty easy. REALLY BRIGHT..use lower watt bulbs. Ann
customer_reviews.author: Ann Gurley

customer_reviews.title: I love the way it 'pops' in my bedroom with the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very classy lamps. Stylish but not trendy! Built solid, The dome is the marble look, the stem is a wood type look but NOT cheep looking it's dark and doesn't have a lot of grain. the silver base and such really set this lamp off. I love the way it 'pops' in my bedroom with the dark furniture.
customer_reviews.author: AZ_Laura

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Came Fast. Easy to assemble. Looks great, the wood on the stand looks good against the cherry coloring of my husbands nightstand. Love that it has 2 lights so we just use one for every day and turn the other on for reading. The glass shade is attractive but not too pretty for a man's light.
customer_reviews.author: D. Power

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: This lamp has great quality. The alabaster shade is heavy and beautifully made. The wooden lamp piece is also of great quality. It is nice to be able to turn on one light instead of two. Packaged well and easy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: VERONICA C.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well made lamps
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved the first 2 of these lamps I got and ended up buying a 3rd one. They are easy to put together and look and work beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Okay....
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp but very bright with the glass cover. I would have returned it but the packaging is not salvageable to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these lamps
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these lamps. they are very unique looking and go great with everything. And I really like the frosted lamp shade. The material ones just fall apart and get so discolored. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Cotter

customer_reviews.title: Good looking but flimsy gooseneck
customer_reviews.text: The finish and quality are good and the ability to vary the light level is nice. Big problem is that the gooseneck is too weak and skinny for any bulb in the reading lamp other than a small incandescent bulb. The gooseneck just drooped horribly with an LED bulb making the lamp unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Indiana Dale

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Bright
customer_reviews.text: Two of these lamps have given my living room a complete makeover. Getting reasonably prices lamps that look nice and work well is always a crap shoot. I'm really happy with the visual appeal and brightness of this lamp. Now I'll hope that they last a long time, too.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Friedman

customer_reviews.title: This lamp is absolutely perfect and a great addition to our family room
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is absolutely perfect and a great addition to our family room. Highly recommended! Unclear why others had problems with assembly as mine was super easy.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Wigal

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: i order this lamp and came in a perfect wrap.I been researching for lamp and this one is very classic and perfect for my desk, specially with the 2 long chains . My husband is very happy with.my friends said that is classic and elegant. if you want to order this item do it you will not dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Durbin

customer_reviews.title: Nice Adesso Table Lamp
customer_reviews.text: It's an attractive lamp. Solid, not flimsy. Gives off good light for reading. Easy to assemble. I like the pull chains the best. Easy on/off. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Exquisite
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. You will not be disappointed. If you are looking for a quality lamp look no further. It looks far more expensive than it is. Very sturdy and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hammond

customer_reviews.title: the swing neck does not easily stay where you want it to go because the ...
customer_reviews.text: The switches seem backwards...lower light is upper switch...wish there were two levels on lower lamp...the swing neck does not easily stay where you want it to go because the lamp shade is heavy on lower light. It accomplishes what I needed but not as well as the last lamp I had of its kind.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: This is a most beautiful lamp with a muted but not too dark glow
customer_reviews.text: This is a most beautiful lamp with a muted but not too dark glow. It fits with a variety of furniture and wall decor. I like the height (higher than the average table lamp). The shade is easy to clean. Love this lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Eveline L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp!
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp, looks great and perfect fit for where we had intended. Packaged well (although I hate that light Styrofoam mold that chips and fly's all over the place), easy to put together. Has some weight to it, feels well made!
customer_reviews.author: Ed W.

customer_reviews.title: use it daily!
customer_reviews.text: it is on my desk - love the way it looks - classy and simple

customer_reviews.title: Not a very attractive modern lamp with too intense of brightness.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp was not super attractive and was abrasively bright/white. Which isn’t dimmable.
customer_reviews.author: Jem

customer_reviews.title: Replacement is perfect. Very nice
customer_reviews.text: First lamp arrived with broken shade, returned and replaced in just a few days. Replacement is perfect. Very nice lamp
customer_reviews.author: Peter D

customer_reviews.title: Classic Look
customer_reviews.text: Rather heavy and solid. Nice classic look. Like that it holds 2 separate bulbs and gives good light through the glass shade. Fits well on our night stands.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Souza

customer_reviews.title: Me Bad
customer_reviews.text: I took it out of the box. It was quite cramped in and I had to tug to get it out. As luck would have it, I dropped it on the garage floor, and it broke into a 100 pieces. Too bad, my fault. It was a nice looking lamp, but never even had a bulb in it. Me bad!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mendelblatt

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Second time ordering. Cleaning ladies broke the glass dome, but my daughter loved this lamp so I bought it again. Great loooking light.
customer_reviews.author: D in NY

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so well I bought four!
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy, sturdy lamp with very nice frosted glass. They look like typical mid century-type lighting, and work well with my decor. Excellent illumination for a lamp its size.
customer_reviews.author: Movin' Mom

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Lamp
customer_reviews.text: We liked everything about this lamp. It is sturdy and at the same time, very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice lamp. I was a bit concerned it may look a little " cheap" in person but it does not! No issues assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this lamp to arrive completely disassembled. There are many many parts.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Beautiful deisgn
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these lamps Great Quality Look terrific in my very eclectic living room
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Desk lamp. Well made and with 2 - 60 watt bulbs it lights up a room.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Cerbone

customer_reviews.title: Nifty lamp
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have was the packaging for this. The styrofoam was a mess! Assembly was pretty easy. I like the look of the lamp, and it's quite bright.
customer_reviews.author: V. Lord

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accent
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is very stylish. It fit perfectly in the room it was needed
customer_reviews.author: joncht

customer_reviews.title: nice wide base keeps lamp stable
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, nice wide base keeps lamp stable. I like the glass lamp shade to allow light unlike the traditional cloth lamp shade. The feature I like most is option to turn on the second bulb if I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Y

customer_reviews.title: The lamp looks very nice and fits well on a small corner table.
customer_reviews.text: The lamp gives additional light for reading and it has a nice design.
customer_reviews.author: E P

customer_reviews.title: looks good, sturdy,
customer_reviews.text: provides the reflected light we wanted for the corner of a room, as well as a good reading lamp. Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.author: Steve Richard

product_meta.title: Adesso 4052-15 Lexington 71" Combo 2-Light Floor Lamp, Walnut, Smart Outlet Compatible
product_meta.description: Size:FloorA traditional silhouette meets modern design in the Lexington Combo floor lamp. The dark walnut rubber wood body holds an alabaster frosted glass dome shade for up lighting as well as a metal-domed adjustable reading light. An Adesso patented 300 Watt Double Socket construction on the uplight allows for two criss-crossed sockets, each holding on/off 150 Watt incandescent bulbs or equivalent CFL's, which provides approximately 3 times more light than a typical torchiere using a 150 Watt 3-way bulb and illuminates an entire room.Two brushed steel rotary switches are located on the pole, one controlling the uplight, the other controlling the reading light. The lamp is accented with a brushed steel base and neck as well. This lamp has a black cord and is smart outlet compatible. Bulbs are not included. All Adesso lighting products are either UL listed or ETL listed, meaning it has been tested and approved to meet the government-regulated safety standards for the USA. When shopping for lighting products, we recommend to always look for the UL or ETL marks to ensure you are purchasing lighting that has been tested for safety standards by a 3rd party testing lab. Unfortunately, not all lighting products in the marketplace have been through 3rd party safety testing.
feature_bullets: An alabaster frosted glass dome shade for up lighting as well as a metal-domed adjustable reading light
Shade Dimesions: (Top) 13.5" diam x 4" H; (Bottom) 6" diam x 3.5" H
Takes (2) 150W Incandescent/equivalent CFL and (1) 60W incandescent/13 CFL (not included)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars340 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
